donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: Under this output, emphasis will be on the development of a National Capacity Development Strategy, Action and Financing Plan.  In addition, the Public Service Act (1994) will be reviewed to align with the Constitution and other regulations as illustrated in the Cabinet Minister's and Principal Secretary's Handbooks.  Mandates of the different recruitment commissions will be rationalized to streamline the recruitment process as well as developing gender-sensitive recruitment guidelines.

Under this activity we will introduce executive leadership training programs for cabinet ministers and members of parliament to appreciate government operations as they relate to public service delivery and spearhead the activities in their respective constituencies.

Under the Activity, a Comprehensive National Human Resource Survey will be conducted to form the basis for the preparation of the national Capacity Development Strategy, Action and Financing Plan as well as other sub-strategies.  Links will be developed with institutions of higher learning to ensure that their training programs respond to the needs of the public service and the economy as a whole. The aim is to also streamline the recruitment process as well as developing gender-sensitive recruitment guidelines.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: To ensure that leadership in the public service utilizes ICT/e-Government in decision-making. This output will focus on developing policies, strategies and standards that would guide ICT/e-Government development and utilization.

To ensure that there exists effective and functional project management structures. This Actvity will ensure that the Project Board is regulary meeting and that periodic monitoring and reporting of project progress is done.
